data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Saba, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saba, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 56 believers in Saba to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,944 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Saba unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

Please, teach the 56 believers in Saba, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Upper Hell‘s Gate
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Upper Hell‘s Gate, Saba, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Saba hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 56 believers in the state of Saba to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.focus_label: Saba, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba
data.section_summary:
the state of Saba, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba has a population of 2,000.

We estimate Saba has 56 people who might know Jesus, 1,382 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 562 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 35 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Saba will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

location.name: Saba
